title: Perth & Kinross Council

review.description: Do the trees / shrubs only get trimmed on Lamberkine drive /Coldstream ave and Innerleithen way when you receive enoug...h complaints from local residents / councillor ? They have been neglected...
Lazy! The roads are absolutely ridiculous and the UK has known about the snow since Friday. It's -0.5 right now on the C...oupar Angus road and not one bit of road has been gritted. I'm safer...
